text: William Roberts Elliott Burley (3 January 1899 – 1976) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1976 deaths Category:People from Devonport, Devon Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Torquay Town F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Peterborough & Fletton United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: William Burley (footballer)
